NOTHING: I don't believe I've seen you around before
My name is Needle. It's a bit of an unusual name don't you think?
I like to think of it as pine needles, but that doesn't feel fitting either.
That's enough about me, I ramble too much.
Oh, I didn't mean that in a negative way, I'm just surprised.
How do I spend my time? Oh, nothing much.
I've been trying to grow some flowers here as you can see. It's a bit silly.
I don't know what they're called.
When I was younger I used to constantly ask every cat I knew haha.
I also collect things. I found this scarf in the human neighbourhood once and this plastic flower.
I'm growing tired of them but it feels odd not to wear them! It's like it's a part of my fur.
Maybe when I grow up I'll put them aside.
I have a question for you...
What do you think about my garden

garden is bad: Yeah I know, it's a bit silly isn't it?
